data.name: Astro Battlers TD
data.detailed_description:
Furballs have never been this scary or hungry! Are you ready!? In this game you defend against the attacks of these cute but deep cutting creatures.
Lane defense genre is back with new twists and turns!







FEATURES

  • Plant traps: Turret, Money Machine, Bomb, Wall, Spikes and Mystery Box
    Upgrade/tweak them all with update points!
  • Level builder: Build & share your own waves!
  • Skill Tree: use stars to apply buffs and effects to fit your playstyle
  • Dynamic defender and ultimates: Move between lanes and defend! Clean waves with help of your friends. Use Laser, Snowball and Buddy Backup
  • Wave Reward Cards! Random prizes make each run different
  • Customize the Kid: Hair, clothing colors, skin tone and more to come
  • Hilarious sounds and amazing graphics
  • Multiple nasty enemy variations: Furry ferocious and sometimes slimy ball-like enemies
    Fartmaster that blows up your defenses, armored Drillers. Worms and more!?
  • No energy system on PC. Game to your heart's content!
  • Three locations, hours of gameplay, post launch updates! Join in!

    Game Modes
    Get rewards no matter what game mode you play!
  • Normal levels: Collect stars and progress in the game.
  • Endless Mode. The waves. Do. Not. Stop.
  • Challenge levels. Pre-set board states and interesting enemy waves
    to tickle your brains.

data.short_description: Kids land on a promising planet but so did dangerous furballs! Who wins? Astro Battlers TD is an up-and-coming roguelite deck building Lane Defense game with permanent and trap upgrades, level builder, dynamic defender, ultimates and challenges! Become an Astro Battler!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Phenom X4 9650 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750 Ti or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.13
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better (64 bit)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Mac compatible
